scripts.build: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:copy: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'); const src=path.join('frontend','dist'), dest=path.join('backend','public'); if(!fs.existsSync(src)) throw new Error('Run npm run build first'); fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(n=>{ const s=path.join(src,n), d=path.join(dest,n); if(fs.statSync(s).isDirectory()) fs.cpSync(s,d,{recursive:true}); else fs.copyFileSync(s,d); }); console.log('Copied frontend/dist to backend/public');"
